alert.note: Alert for Orange; Southern Newton (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Lake Charles (Southeast Texas and Southwest Louisiana)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 24 at 10:59AM CDT by NWS Lake Charles
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northwestern Jefferson Davis, southern Beauregard, central Calcasieu and southwestern Allen Parishes, southwestern Newton and northeastern Orange Counties through 1130 AM CDT... At 1058 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Fenton to near Mauriceville. Movement was north at 35 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Lake Charles, Sulphur, Westlake, Vinton, Iowa, Kinder, Oberlin, Fenton, Reeves, Deweyville, Moss Bluff, De Quincy, Ragley, Starks, Fields, Mauriceville, Gist, Lunita, Topsy and Hartburg. This includes the following highways... Interstate 10 in Louisiana near mile marker 19, and between mile markers 25 and 45. Interstate 210 near mile marker 12. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
